CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) |
| PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) |
| PC 70 BM |
| P3HT (Poly(3-hexylthiophene)) |
| PCBM (Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) - PEDOT:PSS blended with fullerene derivatives) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) |
| PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) |
| PC 70 BM |
| P3HT (Poly(3-hexylthiophene)) |
| PCBM (Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) - PEDOT:PSS blended with fullerene derivatives) |

Explanation:
- PSCs, PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu), PC 70 BM, P3HT, and PCBM are all material names mentioned in the paragraph.
- "Polymer Solar Cells" is a general term, but it refers to a specific type of material used in the context of the paragraph.
- "Based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system" refers to a specific combination of materials, so it is considered as one material entity.
- "Reached 2.71%" and "which was lower than the 4-5 %" are not material names and have been removed.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system |
| 2.71% |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system |
| 2.71% |

Note: PCE stands for Power Conversion Efficiency. It is a material property that refers to the ability of a material to convert light energy into electrical energy. Therefore, it is a valid Property Value entity in this context.
